ComicInfo.Title: The Keepers of the Crypt
ComicInfo.Summary: The Keepers of the Crypt: Conan comes across the ruins of the ancient city of Lanjau, where he battles a giant lizard. He meets a nameless mercenary and they both decide to work together in order to retrieve the lost treasure of Lanjau. Undead creatures, keepers of the crypt, try to stop them but are defeated by sunlight. An earthquake buries the mercenary, Lanjau and the treasure. Conan comes to a nearby village, where he once again meets Jenna. When soldiers come to arrest him, Conan and Jenna flee village on horse.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Robert E. Howard,Roy Thomas,Robert E. Howard,Roy Thomas
